code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CategoriaForm=_ref=>{let{onChange}=_ref;const[categorie,setCategorie]=useState({});useEffect(()=>{fetch('/categorie_raggruppate.json').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setCategorie(data)).catch(err=>console.error('Errore categorie:',err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Categoria:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{name:"categoria",onChange:onChange,required:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"-- Seleziona una categoria --"}),Object.entries(categorie).map(_ref2=>{let[gruppo,lista]=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("optgroup",{label:gruppo,children:lista.map((cat,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:cat,children:cat},i))},gruppo);})]})]});};export default CategoriaForm;
